entry.title: Concurrent Programming in ML: A Race

link.title: Concurrent Programming in ML: A Race

entry.summary: I want to call attention to what I think is a race condition in one of the code listings in the book "Concurrent Programming in ML". The problem is that some of the data isn't protected by a lock, which can lead to a stale read and incorrect behavior. I trace the bad behavior, and propose a fix.
